physical_appearance:This is a bridegroom\u0027s robe or tunic. It has long sleeves
 flared hem
 and opens down the front. The top and bottom section of the garment features a dense
 multicoloured embroidery of repeated geometric patterns.
subject_terms_1:folk costume geometric motifs embroidery (visual works) ceremonial costume bridegrooms

subject_terms_3:Indian costumes
subject_terms_4:
sgcool_label_text:This set of garments - tunic
 trousers and a turban cloth - form a set of bridegroom\u0027s clothes among the Dhebaria Rabari community of east Kutch. The group features excellent cotton embroidery incorporating mirrorwork embellishments. The fabric of the trousers is handwoven Mashroo silk
 while the turban cloth is made from handspun cotton.

metadata.title_text: Robe of the Bridegroom's Dress Wagho, choyni
metadata.physical_appearance: This is a bridegroom's robe or tunic. It has long sleeves, flared hem, and opens down the front. The top and bottom section of the garment features a dense, multicoloured embroidery of repeated geometric patterns.

metadata.sgcool_label_text: This set of garments - tunic, trousers and a turban cloth - form a set of bridegroom's clothes among the Dhebaria Rabari community of east Kutch. The group features excellent cotton embroidery incorporating mirrorwork embellishments. The fabric of the trousers is handwoven Mashroo silk, while the turban cloth is made from handspun cotton.
